name: TeamChatManager
description: Manages team communication via chat platforms. Supports Slack and Microsoft Teams.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: send_message
actions.description: Sends a message to a specified channel or user on the chat platform.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: ID of the channel or user to send the message to

parameters.name: message_text
parameters.description: The text content of the message

parameters.name: is_direct_message
parameters.description: Set to true if sending a direct message to a user_id

actions.name: list_channels
actions.description: Lists available public channels on the chat platform.

actions.name: get_channel_history
actions.description: Retrieves message history from a specified channel.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve

parameters.name: latest_timestamp
parameters.description: Retrieve messages up to this timestamp (exclusive)

actions.name: upload_file_to_channel
actions.description: Uploads a file to a specified channel.

parameters.name: channel_id
parameters.description: ID of the channel to upload the file to

parameters.name: local_file_path
parameters.description: Absolute path of the local file to upload

parameters.name: initial_comment
parameters.description: Optional comment to accompany the file
